statements.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `[[@table-prefix@]]_users` ( `id` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL auto_increment, `email` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `password` char(64) NOT NULL, `first_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `last_name` varchar(32) NOT NULL, `created_on` datetime NOT NULL, `modified_on` datetime NOT NULL, `admin` boolean NOT NULL, `email_notify` boolean NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY (`email`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `[[@table-prefix@]]_sessions` ( `user_id` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `session` char (64) NOT NULL, `challenge` char (64) NOT NULL, `created_on` datetime NOT NULL, `expires_on` datetime NOT NULL, `authenticated` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`, `session`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
